Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored specifically for you, reflecting the product's true worth and my commitment to providing unparalleled service. I trust you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
